pr_title: DBZ-2773 Trigger non-core connectors to resolve cross-repo builds

timeline.bodyText: debezium-core depends on debezium-api so it should be included here and in other instances too
timeline.author: jpechane

timeline.bodyText: You need to build core first here as you do for vitess workflow
timeline.author: jpechane
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+name: Build Incubator Workflow
+
+on:
+  push:
+    paths:
+      - 'debezium-core/**'
+  pull_request:
+    paths:
+      - 'debezium-core/**'
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout Incubator Repository
+        uses: actions/checkout@v2
+        with:
+          repository: debezium/debezium-incubator
+          path: incubator
+      - name: Cache Maven Packages
+        uses: actions/cache@v2
+        with:
+          path: ~/.m2/repository
+          key: ${{ runner.os }}-maven-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
+          restore-keys: |
+            ${{ runner.os }}-maven-
+      - name: Build Debezium Incubator

timeline.message: DBZ-2773 Trigger non-core connectors to resolve cross-repo builds
DBZ-2773 Trigger non-core connectors to resolve cross-repo builds
